name: Star Wars: Rebellion
description: GOG version. Recent GOG installer required (v2 or above).
notes: Tactical battles do not work. Just sim them.

files.game: N/A:Select the Star Wars: Rebellion installer provided by GOG.

content:
exe: drive_c/GOG Games/Star Wars - Rebellion/REBEXE.EXE
files:
- game: 'N/A:Select the Star Wars: Rebellion installer provided by GOG.'
game:
  args: -w
  prefix: $GAMEDIR
installer:
- task:
    args: /silent /nogui /suppressmsgboxes
    executable: game
    name: wineexec
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
